title: Chocolate Chip Soured Cream Cake
ingredients: ['350g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa', '250ml soured cream', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225g unsalted butter', '400g caster sugar, divided', '6 eggs, separated', '1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar', '85g plain chocolate chips']
